content: I'm excited to start tracking my breaks in Todoist. I think it'll really help me stay focused and productive throughout the day. Speaking of focus, I've been having some trouble staying on track during my afternoon work sessions. Do you think Todoist can help me block distracting websites or apps during certain times of the day? For instance, I'd like to block social media during my most productive hours, say from 2 pm to 4 pm.
